name: WIP Tower Project
description:
Remastering the tower game I created a while back for a game jam .

Still a work in progress but wanted it out and available to test, give it a go and let me know what you think, there are a few things not functional yet i.e The Bard does nothing so far and I have yet to add sounds. 

Would be nice to populate the leaderboard a little and get some advice or where to take it next though !
